DOC.detailed_description: Retrospective case series study . A retrospective chart review conduct , include demographic ( age gender ) several parameter first second eye : surgery date , axial length , keratometric corneal power 2 meridian , predict intra-ocular lens ( IOL ) power recommend plano target formula ( HofferQ , SRK II , SRK/T Holladay 1 ) , implant IOL power , predict post-operative refraction implant IOL 4 formula , observe post-operative refraction spherical equivalent post-operative best correct visual acuity . The prediction error calculate first eye ( PE1 ) difference observe post-operative refraction spherical equivalent predict post-operative refraction IOL Master implant IOL . This obtain 4 formula . The prediction error second eye ( PE2 ) obtain similar fashion . The optimal partial adjustment second eye refinement obtain subtract portion PE1 PE2 ( PE2-xPE1 , 0≤x≤1 ) 4 formula . The optimal correction factor determine formulae use array different proportion PE1 apply second eye . The value range 10 % 100 % , increments 10 % .
DOC.criteria: Patients perform bilateral cataract surgery 1st October 2012 24th April 2014 single ophthalmological center ( Centro Hospitalar Baixo Vouga , Portugal ) Inadequate followup Incomplete medical record Previous combine ocular surgery Manual extracapsular cataract extraction phacoemulsification Corneal suture Implantation IOL type different Abbott Tecnis® 1piece IOL ( Abbott Laboratories Inc. , Illinois , USA ) , ZCB00 IOL implant sulcus Intra postoperative complication Postoperative best correct visual acuity bad 5/10 Corneal astigmatism > 3.00 D
